overview: Guided by the floating walk of Ernesto, the main character, Gustavo Biazzi’s first feature film slips into the messy routine of a group a friends taking a vacation that brings them from Posadas to Ituzaingó. Recreating a pace that swings between the unhurriedness of a nasty hangover and the hormonal bursts of a night defined by sex, the first-time director closely observes the birth of a nostalgia that struggles to enter the glowing gaze of these kids who surf through puzzling feelings.
title: The Bums
